vlive.korean: 좀 가깝다? 너무 가깝죠? 더 가까이 갈까? It's kind of cold? Too close? Should I go closer? 듣기 View video ITZY : 깜짝리아브이 기다렸찌~?✌️
vlive.english: It's kind of cold? Too close? Should I go closer?

vlive.korean: 아하! 가깝다! Oh! It's close! 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : <우리 아빠가 생겼어요3> 6회
하늘이랑 가깝다. - 맞아. It's close to the sky. - That's right. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [Stray Kids: 제 9구역 시즌2 (The 9th Season 2)] EP.05
vlive.english: It's close to the sky. - That's right.

vlive.korean: '켄타 치카이가 뭐야?' 하니까 '가깝다' 그래가지고 - 치카이는... And I asked Kenta, "What does it mean?" and he said it means "close". 듣기 View video JBJ95 : [#지금하95] 여러부우우응!!!!!! 우리 일본에 있어요
vlive.english: And I asked Kenta, "What does it mean?" and he said it means "close".

vlive.korean: 엄청 가깝다. It's really close. 듣기 View video BTOB : 현식이 다시 깜짝 V!!

examples.korean: His house is very near. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 집은 아주 가깝다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
